event.title: FREE DRAMA CLASS
event.description:
Drama Nights at Hen and Chicken, Southville, Bristol. Our new term starts Wednesday 26 September at 7pm - 9pm.

FREE TRIAL that day! In addition to weekly classes Drama Nights offers a social events programme with Drama Weekends away, Group Theatre trips, Open Mike nights and much more. A great way to meet people!

Contact Suzanne on[masked] for more details or check out the website on www.dramanights .com

Why not like us on Facebook on http://www.facebook.com/DramaNights?r... to see us performing at The Bath Fringe Festival â€“ see anyone you know?
